trans-unit.source: Provides a stream that uses the Negotiate security protocol to authenticate the client, and optionally the server, in client-server communication.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder en dataflyt som bruker forhandle sikkerhet-protokollen til å godkjenne klienten og eventuelt serveren i klient server-kommunikasjon.

trans-unit.source: Use the NegotiateStream class for authentication and to help secure information transmitted between a client and a server.
trans-unit.target: Bruk klassen NegotiateStream for godkjenning og sikre informasjon som sendes mellom en klient og en server.

trans-unit.source: Using NegotiateStream, you can do the following.
trans-unit.target: Bruker NegotiateStream, kan du gjøre følgende.

trans-unit.source: - Send the client's credentials to the server for Impersonation or Delegation.
trans-unit.target: – Send klientens legitimasjon til serveren for representasjon eller delegering.

trans-unit.source: - Request server authentication.
trans-unit.target: -Forespørselen servergodkjenning.

trans-unit.source: - Encrypt and/or sign data before transmitting it.
trans-unit.target: -Kryptering og/eller signere data før sending av den.

trans-unit.source: Authentication must be performed before transmitting information.
trans-unit.target: Godkjenning må utføres før sending av informasjon.

trans-unit.source: Clients request authentication using the synchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A> methods, which block until the authentication completes, or the asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A> methods, which do not block while waiting for the authentication to complete.
trans-unit.target: -Klienter ber om godkjenning ved hjelp av den synkron <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>metoder som blokkerer før godkjenningen er fullført, eller den asynkrone <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>metoder, som ikke blokker under venting på for å fullføre godkjenningen.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>

trans-unit.source: Servers request authentication using the synchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A> or asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Servere be om godkjenning ved hjelp av den synkron <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>eller asynkron <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>

trans-unit.source: The client, and optionally the server, is authenticated using the Negotiate security protocol.
trans-unit.target: Klienten og eventuelt serveren, er godkjent ved hjelp av forhandle.

trans-unit.source: On Windows 95/98 systems, Windows NT LAN Manager (NTLM) is the protocol used for authentication.
trans-unit.target: I Windows 95/98 systemer er Windows NT LAN Manager (NTLM) protokollen som brukes for godkjenning.

trans-unit.source: On other platforms the Kerberos protocol is used for authentication if both client and server support it; otherwise NTLM is used.
trans-unit.target: På andre plattformer av Kerberos brukes protokollen for godkjenning hvis både klienten og serveren støtter. Ellers brukes NTLM.

trans-unit.source: For detailed descriptions of these protocols, see the Platform SDK documentation on MSDN, at msdn.microsoft.com/library/.
trans-unit.target: For detaljerte beskrivelser av disse protokollene, kan du se Platform SDK-dokumentasjonen på MSDN, på msdn.microsoft.com/library/.

trans-unit.source: The NegotiateStream class performs the authentication using the Security Support Provider Interface (SSPI).
trans-unit.target: Klassen NegotiateStream utfører godkjenning ved hjelp av Security Support Provider Interface (SSPI).

trans-unit.source: When authentication succeeds, you must check the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A> properties to determine what security services will be used by the NegotiateStream to help secure your data during transmission.
trans-unit.target: Når vellykket godkjenning, må du sjekke den <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A>og <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A>Egenskaper for å finne ut hvilke sikkerhetstjenester vil bli brukt av NegotiateStream for å sikre dataene under overføring.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A> property to determine whether mutual authentication occurred.
trans-unit.target: Se den <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A>til å fastslå om gjensidig godkjenning oppstod.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can get information about the remote client or server using the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.RemoteIdentity%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan få informasjon om eksterne klienten og serveren bruker den <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.RemoteIdentity%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.RemoteIdentity%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the authentication fails, you will receive an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException> or a <xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis godkjenningen mislykkes, mottar du en <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>eller <xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>

trans-unit.source: In this case, you can retry the authentication with a different credential.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet kan du prøve godkjenning med en annen legitimasjonstype på nytt.

trans-unit.source: You send data using the synchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.Write%2A> or asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginWrite%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Du sender data ved hjelp av synkron <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.Write%2A>eller asynkron <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginWrite%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginWrite%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.Write%2A>

trans-unit.source: You receive data using the synchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.Read%2A> or asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginRead%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Du mottar data ved hjelp av den synkron <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.Read%2A>eller asynkron <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginRead%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginRead%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.Read%2A>

trans-unit.source: If security services such as encryption or signing are enabled, these are automatically applied to your data by the NegotiateStream.
trans-unit.target: Hvis sikkerhet tjenester som kryptering eller logger er aktivert, brukes disse automatisk til datakilden ved NegotiateStream.

trans-unit.source: The NegotiateStream transmits data using a stream that you supply when creating the NegotiateStream.
trans-unit.target: NegotiateStream overfører data ved hjelp av en dataflyt som du oppgi ved oppretting av NegotiateStream.

trans-unit.source: When you supply this underlying stream, you have the option to specify whether closing the NegotiateStream also closes the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir denne underliggende dataflyten, har du mulighet til å angi om lukking av NegotiateStream lukker underliggende dataflyt også.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream"></xref> class using the specified <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av den angitte <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Stream> object used by the <xref href="System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream"></xref> for sending and receiving data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IO.Stream>objekt som brukes av den <xref href="System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream"> </xref> for sending og mottak av data.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream"></xref> class using the specified <xref:System.IO.Stream> and stream closure behavior.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream"> </xref> klasse parametersettet med de angitte <xref:System.IO.Stream>og flyten avslutning virkemåte.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: When you specify `true` for the `leaveStreamOpen` parameter, closing the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> has no effect on the `innerStream` stream; you must explicitly close `innerStream` when you no longer need it.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir `true` for den `leaveStreamOpen` parameter, lukker den <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>har ingen innvirkning på den `innerStream` flyten; du må lukke eksplisitt `innerStream` når du ikke lenger trenger den.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Stream> object used by the <xref href="System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream"></xref> for sending and receiving data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IO.Stream>objekt som brukes av den <xref href="System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream"> </xref> for sending og mottak av data.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that closing this <xref href="System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream"></xref> has no effect on `innerstream`; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to indicate that closing this <xref href="System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream"></xref> also closes `innerStream`.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>for å angi at lukker dette <xref href="System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream"> </xref> har ingen innvirkning på `innerstream`; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> til å angi at lukker dette <xref href="System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream"> </xref> lukker også `innerStream`.

trans-unit.source: See the Remarks section for more information.
trans-unit.target: Se kommentarer for mer informasjon.

trans-unit.source: Called by clients to authenticate the client, and optionally the server, in a client-server connection.
trans-unit.target: Kalles av klienter til å godkjenne klienten og eventuelt serveren, i en klient servertilkobling.

trans-unit.source: The authentication uses the client's <xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Godkjenningen bruker klientens <xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials%2A>.</xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials%2A>

trans-unit.source: No Service Principal Name (SPN) is specified for the server.
trans-unit.target: Ingen navnet SPN (Service Principal) er angitt for serveren.

trans-unit.source: The impersonation level is <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>, the security level is <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel>, and mutual authentication is requested.
trans-unit.target: Representasjonsnivået er <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>, sikkerhetsnivået er <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel>, og gjensidig godkjenning forespørres.</xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel> </xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> class will construct the SPN used for mutual authentication.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>klassen vil konstruere SPN brukes for gjensidig godkjenning.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>

trans-unit.source: When authentication succeeds, you must check the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A> properties to determine what security services are used by the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>.
trans-unit.target: Når vellykket godkjenning, må du sjekke den <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A>og <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A>Egenskaper for å avgjøre hvilke security-tjenester som brukes av <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A> property to determine whether mutual authentication occurred.
trans-unit.target: Se den <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A>til å fastslå om gjensidig godkjenning oppstod.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the authentication fails, you receive an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException> or an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis godkjenningen mislykkes, mottar du en <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>eller <xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>

trans-unit.source: In this case, you can retry the authentication with a different credential.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet kan du prøve godkjenning med en annen legitimasjonstype på nytt.

trans-unit.target: Kalles av klienter til å godkjenne klienten og eventuelt serveren, i en klient servertilkobling.

trans-unit.source: The authentication process uses the specified credentials and authentication options.
trans-unit.target: Godkjenningsprosessen bruker den angitte legitimasjonen og godkjenningsalternativer.

trans-unit.source: Use the `requiredProtectionLevel` parameter to request security services for data transmitted using the authenticated stream.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av `requiredProtectionLevel` parameteren forespørselen sikkerhet tjenester for data som overføres ved hjelp av godkjente dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: For example, to have the data encrypted and signed, specify the <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel> value.
trans-unit.target: Angi for eksempel hvis du vil at dataene kryptert og signert av <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel>verdi.</xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel>

trans-unit.source: Successful authentication does not guarantee that the requested <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel> has been granted.
trans-unit.target: Vellykket godkjenning garanterer ikke som den forespurte <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel>har fått.</xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel>

trans-unit.source: You must check the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A> properties to determine what security services are used by the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>.
trans-unit.target: Du må kontrollere <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A>og <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A>Egenskaper for å avgjøre hvilke security-tjenester som brukes av <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A>

trans-unit.target: Hvis godkjenningen mislykkes, mottar du en <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>eller <xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>

trans-unit.source: In this case, you can retry the authentication with a different credential.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet kan du prøve godkjenning med en annen legitimasjonstype på nytt.

trans-unit.target: Den navnet SPN (Service Principal) som identifiserer serveren for å godkjenne.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel"></xref> values, indicating the security services for the stream.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel"> </xref> verdier, som angir security-tjenester i dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel> values, indicating how the server can use the client's credentials to access resources.

trans-unit.source: Called by clients to authenticate the client, and optionally the server, in a client-server connection.
trans-unit.target: Kalles av klienter til å godkjenne klienten og eventuelt serveren, i en klient servertilkobling.

trans-unit.source: The authentication process uses the specified credential, authentication options, and channel binding.
trans-unit.target: Godkjenningsprosessen bruker den angitte legitimasjonen godkjenningsalternativer og kanal binding.

trans-unit.source: Use the `requiredProtectionLevel` parameter to request security services for data transmitted using the authenticated stream.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av `requiredProtectionLevel` parameteren forespørselen sikkerhet tjenester for data som overføres ved hjelp av godkjente dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: For example, to have the data encrypted and signed, specify the <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel> value.
trans-unit.target: Angi for eksempel hvis du vil at dataene kryptert og signert av <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel>verdi.</xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel>

trans-unit.source: Successful authentication does not guarantee that the requested <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel> has been granted.
trans-unit.target: Vellykket godkjenning garanterer ikke som den forespurte <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel>har fått.</xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel>

trans-unit.source: You must check the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A> properties to determine what security services are used by the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>.
trans-unit.target: Du må kontrollere <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A>og <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A>Egenskaper for å avgjøre hvilke security-tjenester som brukes av <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ChannelBinding> used for extended protection that is passed to this method in the `binding` parameter would be retrieved by an application from <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.TransportContext%2A> property on the associated <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ChannelBinding>brukes for Utvidet beskyttelse som er sendt til denne metoden i den `binding` parameteren vil hentes av et program fra <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.TransportContext%2A>egenskapen for den tilknyttede <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>.</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> </xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.TransportContext%2A> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ChannelBinding>

trans-unit.source: If the authentication fails, you receive an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException> or an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis godkjenningen mislykkes, mottar du en <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>eller <xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>

trans-unit.source: In this case, you can retry the authentication with a different credential.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet kan du prøve godkjenning med en annen legitimasjonstype på nytt.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential> that is used to establish the identity of the client.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential>som brukes til å opprette identiteten til klienten.</xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ChannelBinding> that is used for extended protection.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ChannelBinding>som brukes for Utvidet beskyttelse.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ChannelBinding>

trans-unit.source: The Service Principal Name (SPN) that uniquely identifies the server to authenticate.
trans-unit.target: Den navnet SPN (Service Principal) som identifiserer serveren for å godkjenne.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel"></xref> values, indicating the security services for the stream.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel"> </xref> verdier, som angir security-tjenester i dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel> values, indicating how the server can use the client's credentials to access resources.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>verdier, som angir hvordan serveren kan bruke klientens legitimasjon for å få tilgang til ressurser.</xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>

trans-unit.target: allowedImpersonationLeveler ikke en gyldig verdi.

trans-unit.source: You can use this object to retry the authentication.

trans-unit.source: Called by clients to authenticate the client, and optionally the server, in a client-server connection as an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Kalles av klienter til å godkjenne klienten og eventuelt serveren, i en klient servertilkobling som en asynkron operasjon.

trans-unit.source: The authentication uses the client's <xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Godkjenningen bruker klientens <xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials%2A>.</xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials%2A>

trans-unit.source: No Service Principal Name (SPN) is specified for the server.
trans-unit.target: Ingen navnet SPN (Service Principal) er angitt for serveren.

trans-unit.source: The impersonation level is <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>, the security level is <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel>, and mutual authentication is requested.
trans-unit.target: Representasjonsnivået er <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>, sikkerhetsnivået er <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel>, og gjensidig godkjenning forespørres.</xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel> </xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> class will construct the SPN used for mutual authentication.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>klassen vil konstruere SPN brukes for gjensidig godkjenning.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>

trans-unit.source: When authentication succeeds, you must check the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A> properties to determine what security services are used by the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>.
trans-unit.target: Når vellykket godkjenning, må du sjekke den <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A>og <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A>Egenskaper for å avgjøre hvilke security-tjenester som brukes av <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A> property to determine whether mutual authentication occurred.
trans-unit.target: Se den <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A>til å fastslå om gjensidig godkjenning oppstod.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the authentication fails, you receive an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException> or an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis godkjenningen mislykkes, mottar du en <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>eller <xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>

trans-unit.source: In this case, you can retry the authentication with a different credential.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet kan du prøve godkjenning med en annen legitimasjonstype på nytt.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> The task object representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>Oppgaveobjekt som representerer den asynkrone operasjonen.</xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ChannelBinding> used for extended protection that is passed to this method in the `binding` parameter would be retrieved by an application from <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.TransportContext%2A> property on the associated <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ChannelBinding>brukes for Utvidet beskyttelse som er sendt til denne metoden i den `binding` parameteren vil hentes av et program fra <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.TransportContext%2A>egenskapen for den tilknyttede <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>.</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> </xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.TransportContext%2A> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ChannelBinding>

trans-unit.source: If the authentication fails, you receive an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException> or an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>.

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous read operation that reads data from the stream and stores it in the specified array.
trans-unit.target: Starter en asynkron leseoperasjon som viser data fra dataflyten og lagrer den i den angitte matrisen.

trans-unit.source: If encryption, signing, or encryption and signing are enabled, the read operation reads the data from the underlying stream, checks the integrity of the data, and decrypts it.
trans-unit.target: Hvis kryptering, logge deg, eller kryptering og er aktivert, leseoperasjonen leser data fra den underliggende dataflyten kontrollerer integriteten til dataene og dekrypterer den.

trans-unit.source: If no security services such as data encryption or signing are in use, this method starts an asynchronous read operation on the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen sikkerhet tjenester som datakryptering eller logger er i bruk, starter denne metoden en asynkron leseoperasjon for underliggende dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: This method is asynchronous and does not block while the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden, er asynkront og blokkere ikke når operasjonen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: To block until the operation completes, use the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.Read%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil blokkere før operasjonen er fullført, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.Read%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.Read%2A>

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous read operation must be completed by calling the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.EndRead%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Asynkron leseoperasjonen må være fullført kaller den <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.EndRead%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.EndRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the method is invoked by the `asyncCallback` delegate.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis metoden startes av den `asyncCallback` delegere.

trans-unit.source: For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) The <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> class does not support multiple simultaneous read operations.
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer detaljert informasjon om hvordan du bruker asynkrone programming modellen [kaller asynkront synkron metoder](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) den <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>klassen støtter ikke flere samtidige leseoperasjoner.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to start a read operation while another read operation is already executing on the same stream, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du prøver å starte en leseoperasjon under en annen operasjon kjører allerede i den samme dataflyten en <xref:System.NotSupportedException>et unntak.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: You cannot call this method until you have successfully authenticated.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke kalle denne metoden før du har godkjent.

trans-unit.source: To authenticate, call one of the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>, or <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: For å godkjenne, kaller du én av de <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>, eller <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Byte> array that receives the bytes read from the stream.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Byte>matrise som mottar byte lest fra dataflyten.</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based location in `buffer` at which to begin storing the data read from this stream.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte plasseringen i `buffer` vil begynne å lagre dataene lese fra denne dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes to read from the stream.
trans-unit.target: Maksimalt antall byte som leses fra dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate that references the method to invoke when the read operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.AsyncCallback>representanten som refererer til metoden som skal startes når leseoperasjonen er fullført.</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous write operation that writes <xref:System.Byte>s from the specified buffer to the stream.
trans-unit.target: Starter en asynkron skriveoperasjon skriver <xref:System.Byte>s fra den angitte bufferen til dataflyten.</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: If encryption, signing, or encryption and signing are enabled, this method reads the data from buffer, encrypts, signs, or encrypts and signs it, and transmits it using the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: Hvis kryptering, logge deg, eller kryptering og er aktivert, denne metoden lese dataene fra bufferen, krypterer tegn, eller krypterer logger den og overfører den ved hjelp av den underliggende dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: If no security services such as data encryption or signing are in use, this method starts an asynchronous write operation on the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen sikkerhet tjenester som datakryptering eller logger er i bruk, starter denne metoden en asynkron skriveoperasjon på underliggende dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: This method is asynchronous and does not block while the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden, er asynkront og blokkere ikke når operasjonen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: To block until the operation completes, use the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.Read%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil blokkere før operasjonen er fullført, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.Read%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.Read%2A>

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous read operation must be completed by calling the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.EndWrite%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Asynkron leseoperasjonen må være fullført kaller den <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.EndWrite%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.EndWrite%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the method is invoked by the `asyncCallback` delegate.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis metoden startes av den `asyncCallback` delegere.

trans-unit.source: For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) The <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> class does not support multiple simultaneous write operations.
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer detaljert informasjon om hvordan du bruker asynkrone programming modellen [kaller asynkront synkron metoder](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) den <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>klassen støtter ikke flere samtidige skriveoperasjoner.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to start a write operation while another write operation is already executing on the same stream, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du prøver å starte en skriveoperasjon mens en annen skriveoperasjon allerede kjører på samme dataflyten en <xref:System.NotSupportedException>et unntak.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: You cannot call this method until you have successfully authenticated.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke kalle denne metoden før du har godkjent.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()`method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av offentlig `Dispose()`metoden og <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metode.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`Aktiverer den beskyttede `Dispose(Boolean)` metoden med den `disposing` parameteren satt til `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>aktiverer `Dispose` med `disposing` satt til `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> references.
trans-unit.target: Når den `disposing` -parameteren er SANN, denne metoden Frigjør alle ressurser holdes av administrerte objekter som denne <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>referanser.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden starter den `Dispose()` metode for hver referert objekt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å frigjøre både administrerte og uforvaltede ressurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Ends a pending asynchronous client authentication operation that was started with a call to <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient*>.
trans-unit.target: Slutter en ventende asynkron klienten godkjenning operasjon som ble startet med et kall til <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient*>.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient*>

trans-unit.source: If the operation has not completed, this method blocks until it does.
trans-unit.target: Hvis operasjonen ikke er fullført, som denne metoden før det gjøres.

trans-unit.source: When the authentication succeeds, you must check the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A> properties to determine what security services are used by the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>.
trans-unit.target: Når godkjenningen lykkes, må du sjekke den <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A>og <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A>Egenskaper for å avgjøre hvilke security-tjenester som brukes av <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsSigned%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsEncrypted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A> property to determine whether mutual authentication occurred.
trans-unit.target: Se den <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A>til å fastslå om gjensidig godkjenning oppstod.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the authentication fails, you receive an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException> or an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis godkjenningen mislykkes, mottar du en <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>eller <xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>

trans-unit.source: In this case, you can retry the authentication with a different credential.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet kan du prøve godkjenning med en annen legitimasjonstype på nytt.

trans-unit.source: To perform this operation synchronously, use one of the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan utføre denne operasjonen synkront ved bruk av <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>metode.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the operation has not completed, this method blocks until it does.
trans-unit.target: Hvis operasjonen ikke er fullført, som denne metoden før det gjøres.

trans-unit.source: You cannot call this method until you have successfully authenticated.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke kalle denne metoden før du har godkjent.

trans-unit.source: To authenticate, call one of the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>, or <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: For å godkjenne, kaller du én av de <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>, eller <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>

trans-unit.source: To perform this operation synchronously, use the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.Write%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: For å utføre denne operasjonen synkront, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.Write%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.Write%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IAsyncResult> instance returned by a call to <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginWrite*>
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IAsyncResult>forekomsten ble returnert av et kall til <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginWrite*></xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginWrite*> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.target: asyncResultis .

trans-unit.source: Authentication has not occurred.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod ikke godkjenning.

trans-unit.source: The write operation failed.
trans-unit.target: Skriveoperasjonen mislyktes.

trans-unit.source: Causes any buffered data to be written to the underlying device.
trans-unit.target: Gjør bufrede data skrives til den underliggende enheten.

trans-unit.source: This method invokes <xref:System.IO.Stream.Flush%2A> on the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden aktiverer <xref:System.IO.Stream.Flush%2A>for underliggende dataflyten.</xref:System.IO.Stream.Flush%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates how the server can use the client's credentials.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir hvordan serveren kan bruke klientens legitimasjon.

trans-unit.source: You must successfully authenticate before calling this method.
trans-unit.target: Du må godkjennes før du kaller opp denne metoden.

trans-unit.source: Clients specify the impersonation level when they request authentication by calling one of the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Klienter angi representasjonsnivået be om godkjenning ved å kalle en av de <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>eller <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you authenticate without specifying a <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel> , <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel> is used.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du godkjenne uten å angi en <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>, <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>brukes.</xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel> </xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>verdier.</xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>

trans-unit.source: Authentication failed or has not occurred.
trans-unit.target: Godkjenning mislyktes eller ikke har startet.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether authentication was successful.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref:System.Boolean>verdi som angir om godkjenningen var vellykket.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Clients authenticate by calling the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Godkjenn klienter ved å ringe det <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>eller <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>

trans-unit.source: Servers authenticate by calling the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Servere Godkjenn ved kall av <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>eller <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if successful authentication occurred; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis det oppstod en vellykket godkjenning; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream"></xref> uses data encryption.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref:System.Boolean>verdi som angir om dette <xref href="System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream"> </xref> bruker datakryptering.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Encryption helps to protect the privacy of the data; namely, it helps to ensure that while data is in transit it cannot be deciphered by third parties.
trans-unit.target: Kryptering bidrar til å beskytte personvernet for dataene. som, hjelper det for å sikre at dataene er i transitt den ikke kan tydes av tredjeparter.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if data is encrypted before being transmitted over the network and decrypted when it reaches the remote endpoint; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis data er kryptert før overføres via nettverket og dekrypteres når den når det eksterne endepunktet; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether both the server and the client have been authenticated.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref:System.Boolean>verdi som angir om både serveren og klienten har godkjent.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Mutual authentication is specified by the client when the client wants the server to provide credentials for authentication.
trans-unit.target: Gjensidig godkjenning er angitt av klienten når klienten ønsker serveren for å angi legitimasjon for godkjenning.

trans-unit.source: By default, clients request mutual authentication.
trans-unit.target: Som standard klienter ber om gjensidig godkjenning.

trans-unit.source: The Negotiate protocol selects either NTLM or Kerberos depending on the security protocols supported by the client and server.
trans-unit.target: Forhandle protokollen velger NTLM eller Kerberos avhengig sikkerhetsprotokollene som støttes av klienten og serveren.

trans-unit.source: NTLM does not support mutual authentication.
trans-unit.target: NTLM støtter ikke gjensidig godkjenning.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the server has been authenticated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis serveren har godkjent; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether the local side of the connection used by this <xref href="System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream"></xref> was authenticated as the server.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref:System.Boolean>verdi som angir om den lokale siden av tilkoblingen brukes av dette <xref href="System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream"> </xref> ble godkjent som serveren.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: If authentication failed or did not occur, this property returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis godkjenning kan ikke eller denne egenskapen returnerer `false`.

trans-unit.source: To authenticate as the server, call the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: For å godkjenne som serveren, kan du kalle den <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>eller <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the local endpoint was successfully authenticated as the server side of the authenticated connection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis det lokale sluttpunktet ble godkjent som serversiden av godkjente tilkoblingen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether the data sent using this stream is signed.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref:System.Boolean>verdi som angir om dataene som sendes ved hjelp av denne dataflyten er signert.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Data signing helps to protect the integrity of the data; namely, it helps the recipient determine whether the data has been tampered with while in transit.
trans-unit.target: Data logger bidrar til å beskytte dataene. som, hjelper det mottakeren bestemme om dataene har blitt endret i transitt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the data is signed before being transmitted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis dataene er signert før overføres; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the length of the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: Henter lengden på den underliggende dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: This property returns the value returned by invoking the <xref:System.IO.Stream.Length%2A> property on the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen returnerer verdien som returneres ved å bruke den <xref:System.IO.Stream.Length%2A>egenskapen i den underliggende dataflyten.</xref:System.IO.Stream.Length%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the underlying stream is not seekable, this property will typically throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den underliggende dataflyten er søkbar, vil denne egenskapen vanligvis Iverksett et unntak.

trans-unit.source: The run-time type of the underlying stream determines the run-time type of the exception that is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Kjøretid bestemmer underliggende dataflyt hvilken kjøretid unntak som er et.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Int64> that specifies the length of the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int64>som angir hvor lenge underliggende dataflyt.</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: Getting the value of this property is not supported when the underlying stream is a <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henting av verdien for denne egenskapen støttes ikke når det underliggende er en <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current position in the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir gjeldende plassering i den underliggende dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: This property returns the value returned by invoking the <xref:System.IO.Stream.Position%2A> property on the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen returnerer verdien som returneres ved å bruke den <xref:System.IO.Stream.Position%2A>egenskapen i den underliggende dataflyten.</xref:System.IO.Stream.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the underlying stream is not seekable, this property will typically throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den underliggende dataflyten er søkbar, vil denne egenskapen vanligvis Iverksett et unntak.

trans-unit.source: The run-time type of the underlying stream determines the run-time type of the exception that is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Kjøretid bestemmer underliggende dataflyt hvilken kjøretid unntak som er et.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Int64> that specifies the current position in the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int64>som angir posisjonen i underliggende dataflyten.</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: Reads data from this stream and stores it in the specified array.
trans-unit.target: Leser data fra denne dataflyten og lagrer den i den angitte matrisen.

trans-unit.source: The method reads a maximum of `count` bytes from the current stream and stores them in `buffer` beginning at `offset`.
trans-unit.target: Metoden leser maksimalt `count` byte fra gjeldende flyten og lagrer dem i `buffer` Start fra `offset`.

trans-unit.source: You cannot call this method until you have successfully authenticated.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke kalle denne metoden før du har godkjent.

trans-unit.source: To authenticate, call one of the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>, or <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: For å godkjenne, kaller du én av de <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>, eller <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>

trans-unit.source: To perform this operation asynchronously, use the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginRead%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: For å utføre denne operasjonen asynkront, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginRead%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Byte> array that receives the bytes read from the stream.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Byte>matrise som mottar byte lest fra dataflyten.</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Int32> containing the zero-based location in `buffer` at which to begin storing the data read from this stream.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>som inneholder den nullbaserte plasseringen i `buffer` vil begynne å lagre dataene lese fra denne dataflyten.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Int32> containing the maximum number of bytes to read from the stream.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>som inneholder maksimalt antall byte som leses fra dataflyten.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Int32> value that specifies the number of bytes read from the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>verdi som angir antall byte lest fra den underliggende dataflyten.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: When there is no more data to be read, returns 0.
trans-unit.target: Når det er ingen flere data leses, returnerer 0.

trans-unit.source: The read operation failed.
trans-unit.target: Leseoperasjonen mislyktes.

trans-unit.source: Authentication has not occurred.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod ikke godkjenning.

trans-unit.source: A Read operation is already in progress.
trans-unit.target: En leseoperasjon pågår allerede.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of time a read operation blocks waiting for data.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir hvor lang tid en leseoperasjon blokkerer venter data.

trans-unit.source: This property returns the value returned by invoking the <xref:System.IO.Stream.ReadTimeout%2A> property on the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen returnerer verdien som returneres ved å bruke den <xref:System.IO.Stream.ReadTimeout%2A>egenskapen i den underliggende dataflyten.</xref:System.IO.Stream.ReadTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you set this property, the <xref:System.IO.Stream.ReadTimeout%2A> value on the underlying stream is set to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir denne egenskapen i <xref:System.IO.Stream.ReadTimeout%2A>verdien for den underliggende dataflyten er satt til den angitte verdien.</xref:System.IO.Stream.ReadTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the underlying stream is a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>, ReadTimeout is in milliseconds and is set to <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite> by default so that read operations do not time out.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det underliggende er en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>, ReadTimeout i millisekunder og er <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>som standard slik som lese operasjoner blir ikke tidsavbrutt.</xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Int32> that specifies the amount of time that will elapse before a read operation fails.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>som angir hvor lang tid det skal gå før en leseoperasjon mislykkes.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets information about the identity of the remote party sharing this authenticated stream.
trans-unit.target: Henter informasjon om identiteten til en ekstern krever dele denne godkjente dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: When accessed by the client, this property returns a <xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericIdentity> containing the Service Principal Name (SPN) of the server and the authentication protocol used.
trans-unit.target: Når av klienten, denne egenskapen returnerer en <xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericIdentity>som inneholder den navnet SPN (Service Principal) til serveren og godkjenning brukes.</xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericIdentity>

trans-unit.source: When accessed by the server, this property returns a <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> that describes the client.
trans-unit.target: Når av serveren, denne egenskapen returnerer en <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity>som beskriver klienten.</xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> is not available, client information is returned to the server in a <xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericIdentity>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity>er ikke tilgjengelig informasjon om klient returneres til serveren i <xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericIdentity>.</xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericIdentity> </xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity> object that describes the identity of the remote endpoint.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity>-objektet som beskriver identiteten til det eksterne endepunktet.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity>

trans-unit.source: Authentication failed or has not occurred.
trans-unit.target: Godkjenning mislyktes eller ikke har startet.

trans-unit.source: Throws <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Oppstår <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: Do not call this method.
trans-unit.target: Ikke kall denne metoden.

trans-unit.source: It is inherited, but is not supported by <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>.
trans-unit.target: Den er arvet, men som ikke støttes av <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>

trans-unit.source: This value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien blir ignorert.

trans-unit.source: This value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien blir ignorert.

trans-unit.source: Always throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Oppstår alltid <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: Seeking is not supported on <xref href="System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Søking støttes ikke i <xref href="System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sets the length of the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: Angir hvor lang den underliggende dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int64> value that specifies the length of the stream.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int64>verdi som angir hvor lang dataflyten.</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: Write the specified number of <xref:System.Byte>s to the underlying stream using the specified buffer and offset.
trans-unit.target: Skrive det angitte antallet <xref:System.Byte>s til underliggende dataflyt ved hjelp av den angitte bufferen og forskyvning.</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: If encryption, signing, or encryption and signing are enabled, this method reads the data from buffer, encrypts, signs, or encrypts and signs it, and transmits it using the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: Hvis kryptering, logge deg, eller kryptering og er aktivert, denne metoden lese dataene fra bufferen, krypterer tegn, eller krypterer logger den og overfører den ved hjelp av den underliggende dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: If no security services such as data encryption or signing are in use, this method invokes <xref:System.IO.Stream.Write%2A> on the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen sikkerhet tjenester som datakryptering eller logger er i bruk, denne metoden aktiverer <xref:System.IO.Stream.Write%2A>for underliggende dataflyten.</xref:System.IO.Stream.Write%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method blocks while the write operation completes.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden blokkerer mens Skriveoperasjonen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: To prevent blocking while the operation completes, use the Write method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke blokkerer mens operasjonen er fullført, kan du bruke Write-metoden.

trans-unit.source: You cannot call this method until you have successfully authenticated.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke kalle denne metoden før du har godkjent.

trans-unit.source: To authenticate, call one of the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>, or <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: For å godkjenne, kaller du én av de <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>, eller <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> class does not support multiple simultaneous write operations.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>klassen støtter ikke flere samtidige skriveoperasjoner.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to start a write operation while another write operation is already executing on the same stream, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du prøver å starte en skriveoperasjon mens en annen skriveoperasjon allerede kjører på samme dataflyten en <xref:System.NotSupportedException>et unntak.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Byte> array that supplies the bytes written to the stream.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Byte>matrise som leverer byte skrevet til dataflyten.</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> containing the zero-based location in `buffer` at which to begin reading bytes to be written to the stream.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>som inneholder den nullbaserte plasseringen i `buffer` vil begynne å lese byte skrives til dataflyten.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Int32> containing the number of bytes to read from `buffer`.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>som inneholder antall byte som leses fra `buffer`.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: buffer is .
trans-unit.target: bufferis .

trans-unit.source: There is already a write operation in progress.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes allerede en skriveoperasjon pågår.

trans-unit.source: This object has been closed.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet er lukket.

trans-unit.source: Authentication has not occurred.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod ikke godkjenning.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of time a write operation blocks waiting for data.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir hvor lang tid en skriveoperasjon blokkerer venter data.

trans-unit.source: This property returns the value returned by invoking the <xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteTimeout%2A> property on the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen returnerer verdien som returneres ved å bruke den <xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteTimeout%2A>egenskapen i den underliggende dataflyten.</xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: For set operations, the specified value sets the <xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteTimeout%2A> value on the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien angir for å angi operasjoner i <xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteTimeout%2A>verdien for den underliggende dataflyten.</xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the underlying stream is a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>, WriteTimeout is in milliseconds and is set to <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite> by default so that write operations do not time out.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det underliggende er en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>, WriteTimeout i millisekunder og er <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>som standard slik som skrive operasjoner blir ikke tidsavbrutt.</xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Int32> that specifies the amount of time that will elapse before a write operation fails.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>som angir hvor lang tid det skal gå før en skriveoperasjon mislykkes.</xref:System.Int32>
